attributes.action: Engage in dialogue with the public on recent Police brutality relating to Ian Tomlinson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent and passed use of Police brutality towards peaceful members of the public is of great concern to us the peaceful living Bromsgrove public.
In this country we can peacefully demonstrate on various issues and subjects, but Police are now attacking the peaceful members of the public with batons and shields that cctv cameras have picked up. The police have also now stopped wearing collar numbers that could recognise them, on top of this they also wear a balaclava whereby the face cannot be recognised either.
We want the Prime minister to engage with the public and aplogise for these disgraceful events and to promise it cannot happen again.
